basics.name: Sebastian Pieczynski
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer focused on delightful User Experience

work.name: IAV Polska S.A.
work.summary: Developing and maintaining software supporting workflows in automotive industry. Applications developed in Python and NodeJS.

work.name: MoreCode Sp. z o.o.
work.summary: I was responsible for project’s architecture (database design, frameworks selection etc.) as well as building both frontend and backend with GraphQL. Application core technologies used are: React, Typescript, PrismaJS, TailwindCSS. Deployed to AWS used PostgreSQL as a database. Technical lead for frontend decisions within small team (3-4 members) as well as providing guidance for junior frontend developer. Requirements were gathered with the client and designs done with Figma. Frontend projects for international company from cyber-security space.
highlights: Architected the application for personal trainings, designed database allowing any type and combination of exercises as well as normalized it for machine learning use.

work.name: ifm ecolink Sp. z o.o
work.summary: Helping users and solving issues affecting both office employees as well as production area. Creating applications that help people complete their work efficiently as well as design ISO processes that assure reliable outcomes.
highlights: Saved thousands of euro yearly by creating web applications to automate processes.
Developed application to track and distribute ISO document.
Web app to manage and monitor tickets and machines in production.
Managed and planned budget for IT department.
Helped in designing security systems as well as network for production halls and new buildings.
As an only IT person on site helped people complete their tasks while company grew to more than 500 employees.

work.name: Opservice Sp. j.
work.summary: Implemented gate payment integration for the website. Bugfixes in code for government clients.

work.name: Koszalińska Agencja Rozwoju Regionalnego S. A.
work.summary: Helping users and solving issues affecting both office employees. Managing and creating company's website using WordPress. Building custom plugins and implementing optimizations using modern (at the time) CSS features.
highlights: Improved performance by 1000% percent by identifying bottlenecks in current implementation.
Redesigned and implemented new website using WordPress and custom theme.
Built mesh-like infrastructure for multi-story building.

work.name: Freelance Web Developer
work.summary: Web development using Joomla and WordPress, customized plugins and solutions implementation.
highlights: Built websites for clients using Joomla and WordPress

volunteer.summary: Managing and helping organize sunday school for children. Teacher for ages 4-10.
highlights: As leaders we have started by redoing all children rooms as well as organized all materials and planned the curriculum for new school year.

volunteer.summary: Teaching children about Bible's truths in simple language and helping them embrace the good values.

publications.name: Comparison analysis for websites based on HHS guidelines.
publications.publisher: National Conference for Students and Young Researchers
publications.summary: Article about quantitative methodology of comparing and ranking websites before Google Lighthouse or other automated testing tools were commonly used. It was also used by Walery Susłow from Technical University of Koszalin to quantitatively rank and grade students' work. It allows to compare end products to selected set of metrics and at the same time gives full control over each metric importance. This allows to rank products/websites while limiting personal biases to minimum since metrics in turn are also quantitative.

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: Personal website with articles powered by Next.js 13, React and MDX.
highlights: Used to learn about Next.js and latest features in React. Built with TailwindCSS and MDX and uses Server Actions and Server Components.

projects.name: Training Application
projects.description: Application that connects Trainers to Trainees and allows to create any type of training regime.
highlights: Database schema is normalized and designed for any exercise regime that can be thought. Built as a React application with GraphQL and TailwindCSS and TailwindUI.

projects.name: Various frontend projects for a company in the cybersecurity space
projects.description: Frontend projects for a company serving millions of customers in the world. Built with React Hooks and best practices.
highlights: Completed two major projects related to UI redesign while adding new features and optimizing performance and user experience.

projects.name: Internal Document Management and Production Ticketing System
projects.description: Document management for ISO standardization documents. Allows for maintenance of ISO standards for the company by a single person department since 2015. Closely developed with the stakeholder.
highlights: Project was considered to be implemented globally worldwide by the company. Followed closely what the customer needed and was in constant development during the years. To this day it is utilized and brings value to the company optimizing document delivery and management.

projects.name: Internal Document Management and Production Ticketing System
projects.description: Ticketing system and machine park maintenance application. Minimizes time to fix the issue and allows better tracking of potential production blockers, improves production process. Generates thousands of euro savings monthly. Close development with management and maintenance department.
highlights: Project has saved thousands and possibly hundreds of thousands of euros to this day in operation costs. Another commercial project was rejected due to cost and it offered similar functionality.

projects.name: Temperature monitoring and visualization
projects.description: Monitoring of areas temperature, humidity as well as gathering historical data for audits of manufacturing goods storage..
highlights: Monitoring created for warehouse material safety and production approval. Thanks to MongoDB's aggregation framework preparing data for the server was counted in milliseconds instead of tens seconds.

projects.name: Log file analyzer
projects.description: CLI application to analyze and filter data from multiple external reports generating single report with requested data.
highlights: Project used streams of data and filtered based on user criteria since files were huge 10s of megabytes in multiple files. It was packaged into an executable that could be run without installing NodeJS.

basics.personalDescription: I am interested in learning, working and contributing to projects that push us fowrard as a species and make the world a better place.

work.codingReason: I love helping others and I do believe that writing quality software can improve people's lives.
